thread.title: Alistair Christie
thread.title_full: SHOWER SEAL LTD reviewed by Alistair Christie

author: Alistair Christie
title: Alistair Christie
text: Once I located the site with the proper parts it was so simple to order and everything arrived next day. I would say this is first class service, and thank you Shower Seal also can I say in comparison to other sites the parts were a third of the price or less even. Would certainly use you again.
